statements: SELECT * FROM pharmaceutical_marketing_campaigns;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM pharmaceutical_marketing_campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, target_audience, open_rate FROM pharmaceutical_marketing_campaigns WHERE open_rate > 20;
SELECT campaign_name, email_subject FROM pharmaceutical_marketing_campaigns WHERE target_audience = 'Doctors';
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date, end_date, click_through_rate FROM pharmaceutical_marketing_campaigns WHERE click_through_rate < 10;
SELECT * FROM pharmaceutical_marketing_campaigns WHERE start_date <= '2022-01-01';
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, target_audience FROM pharmaceutical_marketing_campaigns WHERE open_rate > 10.00 AND click_through_rate < 5.00;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, email_subject FROM pharmaceutical_marketing_campaigns WHERE end_date > '2023-01-01' ORDER BY end_date DESC, campaign_name ASC;
SELECT campaign_name, email_content FROM pharmaceutical_marketing_campaigns WHERE target_audience LIKE '%doctors%';
SELECT DISTINCT target_audience FROM pharmaceutical_marketing_campaigns ORDER BY target_audience ASC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, total_recipients FROM email_campaigns;
SELECT * FROM email_recipients ORDER BY last_opened_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, end_date, total_clicks FROM email_campaigns WHERE total_clicks > 100;
SELECT * FROM email_recipients WHERE subscription_status = TRUE;
SELECT DISTINCT campaign_name FROM email_campaigns ORDER BY start_date ASC;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name FROM email_campaigns WHERE total_recipients > 100 ORDER BY start_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, end_date FROM email_campaigns WHERE total_clicks >= 50 ORDER BY campaign_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM email_recipients WHERE subscription_status = TRUE AND last_opened_date IS NOT NULL ORDER BY last_opened_date DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM email_campaigns WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY total_clicks, total_recipients DESC;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, total_recipients FROM email_campaigns WHERE total_recipients = (SELECT MAX(total_recipients) FROM email_campaigns);
SELECT * FROM Emails WHERE open_status = TRUE;
SELECT email_id, recipient_email, sent_date FROM Emails WHERE campaign_id = 3;
SELECT recipient_email FROM Emails ORDER BY sent_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Campaigns WHERE budget > 5000;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM Campaigns ORDER BY start_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Emails WHERE open_status = TRUE;
SELECT recipient_email, campaign_id FROM Emails WHERE sent_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM Campaigns WHERE budget > 5000.00 ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT email_id, recipient_email, campaign_id, sent_date FROM Emails JOIN Campaigns ON Emails.campaign_id = Campaigns.campaign_id WHERE target_audience = 'Retail';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS Click_Count, purchased FROM Clicks GROUP BY purchased HAVING purchased = TRUE ORDER BY Click_Count DESC;
SELECT * FROM campaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, target_audience FROM campaigns WHERE campaign_id = 3;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_emails FROM emails;
SELECT recipient_email, subject_line FROM emails WHERE send_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM campaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';

SELECT campaigns.campaign_name, emails.recipient_email, conversions.conversion_value FROM campaigns JOIN emails ON campaigns.campaign_id = emails.campaign_id JOIN clicks ON emails.email_id = clicks.email_id JOIN conversions ON clicks.click_id = conversions.click_id WHERE conversions.conversion_value > 100;
SELECT DISTINCT campaign_name FROM campaigns WHERE target_audience = 'Retail';

SELECT emails.recipient_email, campaigns.campaign_name, clicks.click_timestamp FROM emails JOIN campaigns ON emails.campaign_id = campaigns.campaign_id JOIN clicks ON emails.email_id = clicks.email_id ORDER BY clicks.click_timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM EmailSubscribers;
SELECT subscriber_id, email, subscription_date FROM EmailSubscribers WHERE is_active = true;
SELECT last_name, first_name, email FROM EmailSubscribers ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Campaigns WHERE status = 'Active';
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, budget FROM Campaigns ORDER BY budget DESC;
SELECT * FROM EmailSubscribers ORDER BY subscription_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM EmailSubscribers WHERE is_active = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM Campaigns WHERE budget > 5000 ORDER BY start_date ASC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM Campaigns WHERE status = 'Active';

SELECT EmailSubscribers.first_name, EmailSubscribers.last_name, Campaigns.campaign_name FROM EmailSubscribers JOIN CampaignSubscribers ON EmailSubscribers.subscriber_id = CampaignSubscribers.subscriber_id JOIN Campaigns ON CampaignSubscribers.campaign_id = Campaigns.campaign_id;
